name: v0.21.0
body:
## Installation Updates

* Pyproj now handles all the transformations and therefore the PROJ header files are no longer explicitly required by Cartopy.
* Shapely 2.0 is not compatible with this release of Cartopy, and thus Shapely must be pinned <2 during installation.

## What's Changed
* Loosen OSGB tests if grids are unavailable by @QuLogic in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1884
* Remove use of distutils by @QuLogic in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1883
* Regenerate all tick test images by @QuLogic in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1882
* Use UTF8 degree symbol directly by @QuLogic in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1885
* Various test improvements by @QuLogic in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1887
* DOC: Adding an environment file for development by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1890
* added missing shapefile group to download script by @georgemccabe in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1894
* Switch to pytest-mpl for image testing by @QuLogic in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1891
* MNT: Update matplotlib.axes calls to super() by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1896
* Update streamplot test for Matplotlib 3.5.0rc1 by @QuLogic in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1899
* Parametrize inline gridliner tests by @QuLogic in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1900
* Use Gridliner transform for inline labels also by @QuLogic in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1903
* Remove deprecations by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1897
* FIX: pcolor shading with nearest by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1892
* fix imshow when image is RGBA by @ludwigVonKoopa in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1906
* address shapely 2.0 deprecations by @akrherz in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1914
* Added support for 2-dimensional coord in add_cyclic_point. by @mcuntz in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1753
* MNT: Add a cache to the Transformer creation in transform_points by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1918
* FIX: Remove edgecolor from filled features by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1933
* DOC: Add instructions for contributing to Cartopy by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1939
* [doc] Provide install instructions for Ubuntu/Debian by @gpotter2 in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1941
* TST: Update test tolerances for MPL 3.5 by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1938
* MNT: Remove requests and flufl installations by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1949
* DEPR: implement API changes that were scheduled for cartopy>0.18 by @neutrinoceros in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1957
* MNT: Update the natural earth test by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1962
* CI: Fix min dependency build by switching to Linux by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1963
* Parametrize projection test images by @QuLogic in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1964
* FIX: Calculate bbox for pcolormesh by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1958
* CI: Avoid newer openssl version due to WMTS tests by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1977
* Rename master branch to main by @QuLogic in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1976
* fix title of projections.rst by @mathause in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1983
* FIX: Add clip limits to Nightshade floating point calculations by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1989
* TST: Increase dtype of sample data calculations by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1994
* ENH: Allow a single geometry in add_geometries by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1999
* Minimum Python 3.8 by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1990
* Flake8 updating by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1991
* MNT: Remove convert_path from setup script by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2027
* API: GH #2013 make regrid arguments, docstring consistent by @ellequelle in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2014
* TST: Removing unnecessary cleanup decorator by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2023
* TST: Force an orientation in the lakes shapereader test by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2028
* Revert "CI: Avoid newer openssl version due to WMTS tests" by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2038
* examples: define 'sample_data' for all examples by @phil-blain in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2044
* Explicitly calling numpy asanyarray over the inputs. by @axnsantana in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2050
* FIX: setup.py should output "... 8.0.0 *or later*" if proj is missing or too old by @weatherfrog in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1992
* Remove use of setuptools_scm_git_archive by @dopplershift in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2057
* TST: Change testing method for tolerances by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2056
* Fix image tests by @dopplershift in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2058
* Replace _autoscaleX_on with get_autoscalex_on() in GeoAxes by @holzschu in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2054
* docs: fix simple typo, noticable -> noticeable by @timgates42 in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2061
* Additional support for LINZ Maps Tiles by @aluthfian in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2048
* Use contextlib.ExitStack in more places by @QuLogic in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2070
* MNT: Change map_projection to projection for Axes creation by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1980
* Pyproj geodesic trace by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2069
* Fix Axes clearing with Matplotlib 3.6+ by @QuLogic in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2071
* FIX: change deprecated map_projection in test suite by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2073
* TST: Update test path search and pytest deprecations by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2075
* Add functionality for correct transforms in ax.annotate by @abrammer in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2065
* Calculate vertical coord, even if not explicitely requested by @guziy in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2077
* FIX: Allow values less than -180 to be wrapped too by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1998
* DOC: What's new for v0.21 release by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2074

## New Contributors
* @georgemccabe made their first contribution in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1894
* @ludwigVonKoopa made their first contribution in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1906
* @mcuntz made their first contribution in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1753
* @gpotter2 made their first contribution in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1941
* @neutrinoceros made their first contribution in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1957
* @mathause made their first contribution in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1983
* @ellequelle made their first contribution in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2014
* @phil-blain made their first contribution in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2044
* @axnsantana made their first contribution in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2050
* @weatherfrog made their first contribution in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1992
* @holzschu made their first contribution in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2054
* @aluthfian made their first contribution in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2048
* @abrammer made their first contribution in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2065
* @guziy made their first contribution in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2077

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/compare/v0.20.0...v0.21.0

name: v0.20.3
body:
This is the third bug fix release in the 0.20.x series. This mainly fixes a problem with installing from the existing PyPI source distributions with new setuptools_scm.

## What's Changed

* FIX: Add clip limits to Nightshade floating point calculations by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1989
* TST: Change testing method for tolerances by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2056
* Remove use of setuptools_scm_git_archive by @dopplershift in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2057
* Fix image tests by @dopplershift in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/2058

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/compare/v0.20.2...v0.20.3

name: v0.20.2
body:
This is the second bugfix release of the v0.20.x series.

## What's Changed
* Address Shapely 2.0 Deprecations by @akrherz in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1930
* Cache transformer crs for v0.20.x by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1931
* Backport recent master commits to v0.20.x by @greglucas in https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1969


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/compare/v0.20.1...v0.20.2

name: v0.20.1
body:
This is the first bugfix of the v0.20.x series.

See the list of bugfixes on the milestone:
https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/milestone/31?closed=1

name: v0.20.0
body:
Changes include:

Using pyproj for coordinate transformations, which added support for building with Proj 8.
Updating the download URLs for the NaturalEarth and Mapbox APIs, and bundling a download script in the release.
Better handling of gridliner visibility and labeling.
Updated documentation.
And many others.

There are several bug fixes as well. See the milestone for more information.

name: v0.19.0.post1
body: This release only updates the contents contained in the sdist as the previous version did not contain the compiled Cython extensions. All features are the same as v0.19.0

name: Cartopy 0.18.0
body:
Major changes include:

* Support for building against Proj 6.
* Support for Python 3.7 and 3.8.
* Support for Matplotlib 3.2 and 3.3.
* Support for labelling gridlines on all projections.
* Support for labelling gridlines within plot boundaries instead of edges.
* Support for labelling of contours.

and many others.

There are several bug fixes as well. See [the milestone](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/milestone/25?closed=1) for more information.

### Contributors
@MBradbury @MarkWieczorek @QuLogic @ahuang11 @dopplershift @greglucas @htonchia @hugovk @kacmak7 @kaedonkers @ocefpaf @pelson @pharshalp @raphaelquast @sadielbartholomew @shevawen @snowman2 @stefraynaud @stephenworsley @wrongkindofdoctor @zbruick

name: v0.17.0
body:
## Version 0.17 (2018/11/17)

### Issues Closed

* [Issue 1171](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/issues/1171) - Shapereader doctest failure
* [Issue 1155](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/issues/1155) - Admin 1 features incompletely drawn in some cases ([PR 1160](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1160))
* [Issue 1144](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/issues/1144) - Clipping issue with Geostationary/NearsidePerspective
* [Issue 1131](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/issues/1131) - contourf producing maps with blank spots ([PR 1146](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1146))
* [Issue 1128](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/issues/1128) - nightshade feature implemented? ([PR 1135](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1135))
* [Issue 1126](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/issues/1126) - Incompatible with matplotlib 3
* [Issue 1120](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/issues/1120) - AttributeError: 'GeoAxesSubplot' object has no attribute '_hold'
* [Issue 1112](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/issues/1112) - Adjust `setup.py` to reflect PEP-518, instead of throwing a "you need cython" error. ([PR 1132](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1132))
* [Issue 1111](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/issues/1111) - Ensure function with Proj4 version 5+
* [Issue 1099](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/issues/1099) - SegFault for initializing cartopy crs for Southern Hemisphere LambertAzimuthalEqualArea ([PR 1100](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1100))
* [Issue 1097](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/issues/1097) - Error specifying center long for Mercator projection and extents on Python 3.6 ([PR 1124](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1124))
* [Issue 1080](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/issues/1080) - SRTM path in USGS server changed
* [Issue 1078](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/issues/1078) - Closed line is wrapping around the border ([PR 1162](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1162))
* [Issue 1071](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/issues/1071) - Test failure with Proj v5.0.1 ([PR 1124](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1124))
* [Issue 1060](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/issues/1060) - triplot IndexError when lost marker and linestyle paraments ([PR 1062](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1062))
* [Issue 1056](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/issues/1056) - setting up a cartopy google group?
* [Issue 1045](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/issues/1045) - Support Proj > 4 ([PR 1124](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1124))
* [Issue 1040](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/issues/1040) - Support more parameters for Mercator ([PR 1043](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1043))
* [Issue 1015](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/issues/1015) - missing gridlines: InterruptedGoodeHomolosine ([PR 1146](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1146))
* [Issue 996](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/issues/996) - cartopy.geodesic is undocumented ([PR 1169](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1169))
* [Issue 992](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/issues/992) - Remove pcolormesh patched?
* [Issue 986](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/issues/986) - Display all 60 zones of UTM projection in projection list
* [Issue 802](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/issues/802) - Mollweide plotting error for bounds on pole ([PR 1146](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1146))
* [Issue 724](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/issues/724) - Mollweide projection for polygons that intersect a pole ([PR 1146](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1146))
* [Issue 580](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/issues/580) - cartopy.mpl.feature_artist.FeatureArtist.draw does not preserve ordering for facecolors, etc ([PR 1019](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1019))
* [Issue 403](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/issues/403) - Stuck while loading 10m oceans
* [Issue 387](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/issues/387) - Autoscale the stock feature classes, and allow users to manually set the scale
* [Issue 310](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/issues/310) - Incorrect Polygons for some filled contour plots
* [Issue 250](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/issues/250) - Consider using Fiona for reading Shapefiles
* [Issue 158](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/issues/158) - Remove path_to_geos heuristics ([PR 1162](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/pull/1162))

In this release 30 issues were closed.

### Pull Requests Merged

* [PR 1201](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1201) - Make nightshade example figure size consistent.
* [PR 1199](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1199) - TST: Disable downloads in autoscaler tests.
* [PR 1197](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1197) - SlippyImageArtist redraw on mouse down
* [PR 1196](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1196) - Add pretty Jupyter repr of Projections
* [PR 1195](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1195) - Add raster caching to smooth pan/zoom
* [PR 1191](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1191) - Fix bug in exception for outdated Proj.
* [PR 1189](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1189) - Fix up the satellite projections (Fixes #1144)
* [PR 1188](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1188) - Add a cartopy.io.img_tiles.Stamen class ([1013](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/issues/1013))
* [PR 1185](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1185) - TST: Install all doc deps at the same time.
* [PR 1182](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1182) - Add Equal Earth projection
* [PR 1181](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1181) - Moved the nightshade implementation into a feature.
* [PR 1180](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1180) - Improve warped rectangular projections
* [PR 1178](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1178) - Fixes to testing, improved travis.yml and use plt instead of pyplot
* [PR 1173](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1173) - Add links to the Gitter chatroom
* [PR 1170](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1170) - Update mapbox tiles interface
* [PR 1169](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1169) - Improve docs for Cython extensions ([996](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/issues/996))
* [PR 1168](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1168) - Add Eckert family of projections
* [PR 1167](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1167) - Normalize and (slightly) speedup boundary and limit calculations
* [PR 1163](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1163) - Add Travis configuration to upload sdists to PyPI ([1163](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/issues/1163))
* [PR 1162](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1162) - Stop guessing whether Paths are polygons on new MPL. ([158](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/issues/158), [1078](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/issues/1078))
* [PR 1160](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1160) - Use both x/y limits to determine Mercator threshold. ([1155](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/issues/1155))
* [PR 1159](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1159) - TST: Allow new test images to use any mpl style.
* [PR 1158](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1158) - TST: Update web tiles result image.
* [PR 1153](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1153) - Update sphinx-gallery to 0.2.0
* [PR 1150](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1150) - Use pykdtree when available
* [PR 1148](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1148) - Fuzz more projection boundaries to work with proj >= 5
* [PR 1146](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1146) - Fix projected line strings getting truncated early. ([802](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/issues/802), [724](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/issues/724), [1131](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/issues/1131), [1015](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/issues/1015))
* [PR 1145](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1145) - TST: Add a fixture enabling SRTM login using envvars.
* [PR 1143](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1143) - Update SRTM url and fix tests
* [PR 1139](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1139) - Add more projection-specific tests
* [PR 1138](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1138) - Add support for other radii in Miller projection + tests
* [PR 1137](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1137) - Fix some minor typos and style issues
* [PR 1136](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1136) - Deprecate clip_path.
* [PR 1135](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1135) - Adding a nightshade/terminator feature ([1128](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/issues/1128))
* [PR 1132](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1132) - BLD: Add pyproject.toml defining build requirements. ([1112](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/issues/1112))
* [PR 1130](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1130) - Fix support for Matplotlib 3.0.0
* [PR 1129](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1129) - TST: Speed up travis a bit
* [PR 1124](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1124) - ENH: Support proj4 v5+ ([1097](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/issues/1097), [1071](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/issues/1071), [1045](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/issues/1045))
* [PR 1123](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1123) - DOC: Fix some minor issues
* [PR 1122](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1122) - Fix deprecations from NumPy
* [PR 1121](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1121) - TST: Fix license checks with new git and Python.
* [PR 1103](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1103) - Add all 60 zones of the UTM projection to the docs projection list
* [PR 1101](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1101) - Use tuple for multidimensional array indexing
* [PR 1100](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1100) - Prevent segfault in LambertAzimuthalEqualArea ([1099](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/issues/1099))
* [PR 1096](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1096) - Input validation for Geodesic.inverse, and a new Geodesic.geometry_length method
* [PR 1091](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1091) - TST: Add unit test for tranform_point with empty arrays
* [PR 1090](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1090) - Fix crash
* [PR 1083](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1083) - Make changes suggested to solve gshhs zipfile path problems on windows
* [PR 1075](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1075) - conda list --explicit
* [PR 1070](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1070) - Update image tests for matplotlib 2.1.
* [PR 1069](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1069) - Make use of README.md in setup.py, and update README.md to include some badges and an image
* [PR 1063](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1063) - DOC: Update conda to try to fix circleci.
* [PR 1062](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1062) - Fix transform_points for empty arrays ([1060](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/issues/1060))
* [PR 1057](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1057) - DOC: Add Get in touch section
* [PR 1054](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1054) - DOC: change natural_earth to shapereader.natural_earth in example
* [PR 1053](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1053) - add epsg 3857 support to wmts
* [PR 1052](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1052) - force string conversion for wmts row, col and tile set id
* [PR 1043](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1043) - Add more options to Mercator projection ([1040](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/issues/1040))
* [PR 1042](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1042) - Normalize grid coordinates used for interpolation.
* [PR 1041](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1041) - Drop support for Matplotlib < 1.5.1 and NumPy < 1.10
* [PR 1037](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1037) - Add ne_ prefix to NaturalEarth cache files.
* [PR 1036](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1036) - Ensure copyright & license is followed for sphinx-gallery.
* [PR 1034](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1034) - Update some doc refs
* [PR 1032](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1032) - Improvements to test metadata
* [PR 1031](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1031) - Add a zenodo badge for cartopy.
* [PR 1029](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1029) - Better support colour overrides for Features.
* [PR 1022](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1022) - Add support for Equidistant Conic projection.
* [PR 1019](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1019) - Added the styler keyword to allow on-demand / callback to determine styling of geometries in the matplotlib interface. ([580](https://github.com/SciTools/cartopy/issues/580))
* [PR 1000](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/1000) - Creating a Fiona Reader for shapefiles
* [PR 951](https://github.com/SciTools/Cartopy/pull/951) - Add _repr_html_ to Projection class

In this release 70 pull requests were closed.

### Contributors
@acrosby, @ajdawson, @bjlittle, @dkillick, @dopplershift, @greglucas, @kaedonkers, @LukeC92, , @manugarri, @pelson, @QuLogic, and @raybellwaves contributed changes in this release.

name: v0.15.1
body:
Bugfix release. Changes:
- OSGB projection added to the list of native SRS' for WMS/WMTS retrieval (#861).

name: v0.11.2
body:
- Fixed the URL for Natural Earth downloads.
- Updated the INSTALL file to better reflect some dependencies.
